summary: Four labourers are tortured by the police to confess to a theft they have not committed.
cast: Dinesh|Samuthirakani|Anandhi|Murugadass|Kishore Kumar G.|Misha Ghoshal|Raj Pradeesh|Ajay Ghosh|E. Ramdoss|Alwa Vasu|Munnar Ramesh|Dhaya Senthil|Saravana Subbiah|Muthukumar|Cheran Raj|Silambarasan Rathnasamy
title: Visaaranai
